title: Journal Reference
description: This represents the list of journal articles cited.

article-authors.title: article-authors
article-authors.description: Authors of the journal article, in order of appearance, written as <first name><space><middle name(s)><space><last name><comma>
examples: Jean Grey, Scott Summers, Hank McCoy, Erik Magnus Lehnsherr, Charles Francis Xavier

journal-title.title: article-title
examples: Howlett: Novel Wolverine protein contributes to rapid regeneration and heightened cellular replication

journal-pages.title: journal-pages
journal-pages.description: First page and last page, separated by a comma; for single page articles, a single value may be used

journal-title.title: journal-title
journal-title.description: Title of the journal the work was published in

journal-volume.title: journal-volume
journal-volume.description: Volume of the journal that the work was published in
